It also has a tint color and a lovely scent. I bought medium/deep. I definitely recommend buying this product if you do not want to wear heavy foundation and/or want a natural looking complexion.
customer_reviews.author: JB Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice...creamy, easy to apply, perfect for me. I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Consistency always changing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product however this is the third tube I've gotten of the exact same product and each time the consistency is different. The first tube was rather thick, the second was more watery and now I've gotten the thick again. The thinner consistency covered better that the thick. My friend also uses this product and has experienced the same thing in different tubes she's gotten. It's a nice, light base... I wear it when going to the gym to save on the cost of using my more expensive base.
customer_reviews.author: nancy stango

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of those items that you should just spend more on. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and smooth and moisturizes too. Sad I cant find it in the store anymore
